Original:
2022.01.02 日

在隔壁吃完麻辣火鍋，朋友提議附近找個 Bar 喝一杯，就直接挑了這間店。店內一樓大多是兩人桌或吧台區，地下室有好幾組四人座位，裝潢很復古有趣，放眼望去會覺得好像回到三十年前。

酒單也很有特色，大部分都是以茶入酒，分成港、台、華、日、荷西、其他，共六大類，前面五類都各自有氣泡、蓬鬆、純淨、晚安這四種，每一種酒都有註明基底跟口感，實際上喝的時候會有一種「啊，沒想到是這種味道」的感覺。

據說食物滿好吃，可惜已經很飽了就沒點餐，下次會想試試看！
EN:
2022.01.02

After eating the spicy hot pot next door, my friend proposed to find a BAR to drink a drink nearby, and he picked the shop directly.The first floor of the store is mostly two -person tables or bar areas. There are several groups of four -seater seats in the basement. The decoration is very retro and interesting. Looking at it, it seems that it seems to return to thirty years ago.

The wine list is also very distinctive. Most of them are into the wine with tea, which are divided into six categories: Hong Kong, Taiwan, Hua, Japan, Jose, and others. The first five categories have four types of bubbles, fluffy, pure, and good night. Each wine has a sense of basis and taste. In fact, there will be a feeling of "ah, I did not expect this taste".

It is said that the food is delicious, but unfortunately I have no order when I was full. I would like to try it next time!

Original:
裝潢很有味道一家店，喜歡這種風格的會很喜歡。
酒種還算多元，除了酒單上經典調酒及店內特調以外，也可以請調酒師幫你做個人的特調，一杯基本上350-400左右，以東區的酒吧來說算正常價格，雖然假日店內有2杯的低消，不過店家也不會很嚴格的去算你的錢是否有達標，服務也很熱情，招待了我們地瓜薯片及一盤shot。
這邊的調酒味道算是蠻特別的，層次和一般的酒吧不同，我覺得要親自來試試看才知道，算是值得來試試看的一家酒吧。
EN:
The decoration is very delicious, and those who like this style will like it very much.
The wine species is quite diverse. In addition to the classic bartending and the special adjustment of the store on the wine list, you can also ask the bartender to help you make your personal special. A cup is basically about 350-400. Although there are 2 cups in the holiday store, the store will not strictly calculate whether your money has reached the standard, and the service is also very enthusiastic. It entertains our sweet potato chips and a plate of shot.
The taste of bartender here is quite special. The level is different from the ordinary bar. I think it is necessary to try it in person to know that it is worth trying to try.

Original: 這家酒吧的氛圍還算一般，裝潢簡單，沒有特別出彩的地方。這對我來說有點太大聲了，讓談話變得困難。然而，雞尾酒非常好，絕對是當晚的一大亮點。不過，真正出色的是工作人員。他們非常出色，提供了很好的建議，並確保我們得到了我們喜歡的東西。他們的專注恰到好處——在需要的時候他們就會出現，但從不專橫。總的來說，如果您正在尋找優質飲料和一流的服務，那麼這是一個不錯的地方。
EN: The atmosphere of this bar is quite average, the decoration is simple, and there is no special place.This is a bit loud to me, making the conversation difficult.However, cocktails are very good, it is definitely a highlight of the night.However, the real thing is the staff.They are very good, provide good suggestions and make sure we get what we like.Their focus is just right -they will appear when they need it, but they are never specifically.In general, if you are looking for high -quality drinks and first -class services, then this is a good place.

Original:
酒吧的氣氛和室內裝飾確實是最好的！裡面不大，但是地下室有空間真是太好了（空間利用得最好）總的來說，地下室真的很漂亮… ！這是我真的很想常去的氛圍…工作人員的判斷力是（絕對的）😮‍💨 週末僅限2小時，但即使過了10分鐘，我們倆還要再點一杯飲料......嗯，看起來這裡的食物是從外面買的，但說實話，味道馬馬虎虎，價格馬馬虎虎。
其實氣氛很好，本來以為會常去，但是工作人員的感覺讓我一次都沒去😅 不過還是值得去享受氣氛和拍照的酒吧！
航空旅行，旅行，旅行，旅行，旅行，旅行，旅行等等，味道好，味道好，味道，價格，價格
讓我們迎接能量，一起對抗敵人吧！
EN:
The atmosphere and interior decoration of the bar are indeed the best!It is not large, but there is space in the basement (the best use of space). In general, the basement is really beautiful ...!This is the atmosphere that I really want to go often ... The staff's judgment is (absolutely) 😮‍💨 only 2 hours on the weekend, but even after 10 minutes, the two of us have to order another drink .... .. Well, it seems that the food here is bought from the outside, but to be honest, the taste is sloppy and the price is sloppy.
In fact, the atmosphere was very good. I thought I would go often, but the staff's feelings made me not go at once, but it was still worth enjoying the atmosphere and taking pictures!
Aviation travel, travel, travel, travel, travel, travel, travel, etc., tastes good, taste, taste, price, price, price, price, price
Let's greet our energy and fight against the enemy together!
